item.title: TF-Watcher
item.description:
TF Watcher is a simple to use Python package and web app which allows you to monitor ðŸ‘€ your Machine Learning training or testing process on mobile devices ðŸ“± built specially for Google Colab, Azure ML and Kaggle. Dedicated to all ML Developers with â¤ï¸.

This is a Python Package built using TensorFlow and Pyrebase (a python wrapper for the Firebase API). This allows to eaisly monitor the metrics you want and writes them to Firebase realtime database.
